column1: '''''Echuir''''' was the [[Sindarin]] name for the '''Stirring''', the [[Elves
column2: Elvish]] season that lay before Spring.<ref>{{SD
column4: Index1}} (entry "Stirring")</ref> In the [[Reckoning of Rivendell]] it was the last season of the year, and corresponded more or less to the 54 days between [[11 February]] and [[4 April]] in the [[Shire Calendar]].<ref>{{App
